description: With the Conquest ‘Road to Chios’ world series rapidly approaching the conclusion and climax of its first season, Australia has been hosting qualifying events for players across the country. CanCon 2024 was held in Canberra in January, The Coming of Kings in Western Australia in February, and Briscon 2024 in Brisbane in May. And, this […]
title: Conquest – Tournament Report: Old Dominion at Conquer Canberra

description: Here at Goonhammer, we know that it’s hard to keep track of all the news happening all the time in the games industry. So much is always going on with games of all sorts, and their related media, it can be a real blink-and-you’ll miss it situation.  That’s why every week, we round up five […]
title: Games Industry News Roundup- July 16th, 2024

description: Goonhammer has had the best Age of Sigmar fourth edition article coverage out there during the release window so far this summer, and we’re continuing to bring that coverage to video. Campbell’s here to talk about the General’s Handbook, in a hands-free eyes-optional version of this piece from the website. Have any questions or feedback? […]
title: New Goonhammer Video: Age of Sigmar Fourth Edition General’s Handbook

description: Namor, the Sub-Mariner, Marvel’s “first mutant” and King of Atlantis is the focus of today’s How to Paint Everything. He’ll be seeing release in the Black Panther, Chosen of Bast & Namor, the Sub-Mariner pack for Marvel: Crisis Protocol, releasing on July 12, 2024. This model has a few interesting things for us to paint, […]
title: How to Paint Everything: Marvel Crisis Protocol – Namor the Sub-Mariner

description: Surprise! It’s a rules update. Here at Goonhammer Dot Com we’re big fans of the W’adrhŭn, greatest of Conquests armies (Editor: Sockbert wrote this hot take, didn’t they?), and it’s always good to see Para Bellum doing a bit of what we call active management of the game. The overall theme of this update appears […]
title: Conquest Hot Take: July W’adrhŭn Changes

description: Fresh out of Mech Commander 2, the Starslayer is a new plastic mini out of the Mercenaries Kickstarter, and Perigrin is taking a look.
title: Battletech Mech Overview: Starslayer

description: A training mech pushed into combat, the Chameleon is perhaps not the most effective mech we've reviewed. Can Perigrin find any good variants?
title: Battletech Mech Overview: Chameleon

description: CMON has completed their second ASOIAF campaign for a new skirmish version of the ASOIAF: TMG. It spans across multiple eras of George R. R. Martin’s world, where previously their game was restricted to the War of the Five Kings. There is so much to talk about for the game, but my personal passion is […]
title: ASOIAF Tactics – Battle of the Trident Initial Review

description: The Goonhammer group is made up of dozens of multi-talented authors, many of whom have other projects outside of the site. In addition to their work here, Dan Boyd and Campbell “SRM” McLaughlin have their own podcast, the 40K Badcast, a member of the Goonhammer Media Network.   We could have named this episode “If […]
title: 40K BADCAST 152 – THE CAST? BAD. THE MUTANTS? SAD.

description: Jason and Travis chat with Kevin S, 2nd place at the Goonhammer Open, about the incoming Scout Squad meta!
